thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-The Medicines Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $2.19 From Continuing Operations

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-The Medicines Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $2.19 From Continuing Operations
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Medicines Co:
* THE MEDICINES COMPANY REPORTS FOURTH-QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017 BUSINESS AND FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $2.19 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * Q4 REVENUE $8.6 MILLION * Q4 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.61 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* WORLDWIDE NET REVENUE WAS $8.6 MILLION IN Q4 OF 2017 VERSUS $17.4 MILLION IN Q4 OF 2016 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
